![Spa Plus (Ïä§ÌååÌîåÎü¨Ïä§)](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042185_image2_1.webp) ## Overview > Spa Plus is located in Icheon City, Gyeonggi-do Province, which has been a famous hot springs region for over 500 years. It has been said that Spa Plus‚Äô hot spring waters have healing components that are effective in treating eye diseases and skin troubles. Spa Plus presents a variety of jjimjilbang themed areas to enjoy along with an outdoor area where you can relax in the warm hot spring waters.

First opened in December of 2002, Spa Plus is a hot springs facility located inside the Hotel Miranda, which is the largest 2nd class hotel of the Icheon area. The main spa complex is located on the 10th floor and the annex on the 3rd floor. ## Intro | | | | - | - | |infocenter:|‚Ä¢ 1330 Travel Hotline: +82-2-1330

Add jjimjilbang: 5,000 won| |Reservation Info. for Natives:|Phone-reservation required| ## Detail Image ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042199_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042199_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042220_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042220_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042221_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042221_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042222_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042222_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042227_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042227_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042228_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042228_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042230_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042230_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042232_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042232_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042223_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042223_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042225_image2_1.webp](/2022-09-07-1662537392811/2042225_image2_1.webp) ## Contact - [‚òéÔ∏è+82-31-639-5000](tel:+82316395000) - [üè†www.mirandahotel.com](http://www.mirandahotel.com/) ```googleMap latitude: 37.2759992443 longitude: 127.4511669061 title: 45, Jungnicheon-ro 115beon-gil, Icheon-si, Gyeonggi-do ``` ## Directions [Bus]
From Seoul Express Bus Terminal, take an express bus to Icheon Bus Terminal.
Walk for approx. 767m to the venue.

data.title: Spa Plus (Ïä§ÌååÌîåÎü¨Ïä§)
data.description:
Spa Plus is located in Icheon City, Gyeonggi-do Province, which has been a famous hot springs region for over 500 years. It has been said that Spa Plus‚Äô hot spring waters have healing components that are effective in treating eye diseases and skin troubles. Spa Plus presents a variety of jjimjilbang themed areas to enjoy along with an outdoor area where you can relax in the warm hot spring waters.

First opened in December of 2002, Spa Plus is a hot springs facility located inside the Hotel Miranda, which is the largest 2nd class hotel of the Icheon area. The main spa complex is located on the 10th floor and the annex on the 3rd floor.
data.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Wentteok Village (Ïõ¨Îñ°ÎßàÏùÑ)
dataList.description:
Wentteok Village gets its name from the word ‚ÄúWentteok‚Äù (meaning ‚Äúunexpected windfall‚Äù) and is a slow food village located in Jungneung-ri, Wonsam-myeon, Yongin-si, Gyeonggi-do. At the village, you can make traditional rice cake from fresh seasonal ingredients or make a tteok (rice cake) cake and have your own small party.

The village is a great venue to learn more about tteok (rice cakes) and to enjoy other hands-on activities such as eco-friendly farming activities and other traditional activities.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Unaksan National Recreational Forest (Íµ≠Î¶Ω Ïö¥ÏïÖÏÇ∞ÏûêÏó∞Ìú¥ÏñëÎ¶º)
dataList.description:
Unaksan Mountain rises 934.7 meters above sea level. Oddly shaped rocks and peaks make the landscape particularly beautiful. Historical relics from the Later Goguryeo period, including the site of a fortress for Gung Ye (the first king of the short-lived Later Goguryeo state) can be seen on the mountain. Majestic peaks surround Mangyeongdae, the main peak, and forests of broad-leaved trees turn striking colors in the fall.

The trails are beautiful with purple magnolias in mid-April and azaleas and mountain magnolias in May. The Unaksan Mountain Autumn Leaves Festival is held in mid-October every year as the leaves begin to turn. Together with Gwanaksan, Chiaksan, Hwaaksan, and Songaksan Mountains, Unaksan Mountain is one of the five most rugged mountains in the Central region and a popular one.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Uijeongbu Budaejjigae Street (ÏùòÏ†ïÎ∂Ä Î∂ÄÎåÄÏ∞åÍ∞úÍ±∞Î¶¨)
dataList.description: The leading Uijeongbu Budaejjigae Street is where local restaurants began to be built in 1998. Here you can taste budae jjigae (kimchi and hotdog soup), which is made by boiling Western ingredients such as ham, sausage, canned American beans, mixed with kimchi and hot pepper paste.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Typhoon Observatory (ÌÉúÌíçÏ†ÑÎßùÎåÄ)
dataList.description:
Typhoon Observatory was built on December 3, 1991 by Invincible Typhoon Korean Army. The observatory is situated on Suribong Peak, the highest point of Bikkisan Mountain. It is located 65 kilometers and 140 kilometers from Seoul and Pyeongyang respectively. It is famous in that the location is the closest to the Military Demarcation Line, being only 800 meters and 1,600 meters away from the MDL and North Korean checkpoint respectively.

The observatory houses a Christian church, Catholic church, statue of the Virgin Mary, Buddhist sanctum, belfry and other facilities where soldiers are able to participate in religious ceremonies. Also, Manghyangbi Monument for displaced person, Monument for Korean War, and Boy‚Äôs Tank Corps Memorial can be seen in the area. The Exhibition Hall presents daily necessities collected from Pilseunggyo Bridge of Imjingang in North Korea and some detection equipment that armed espionage agents used when they did infiltration after the ceasefire.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Traditional Food Town around Namhansanseong Fortress (ÎÇ®ÌïúÏÇ∞ÏÑ± Ï†ÑÌÜµÏùåÏãùÎßàÏùÑ)
dataList.description: The Traditional Food Town around Namhansanseong Fortress has many restaurants offering rice, dotorimuk (acorn jelly salad), tojongdak (whole chicken) dishes, and other traditional dishes. The area embraces almost 300 years of Korean history and the restaurants were built in traditional hanok-style buildings around Namhansanseong Fortress, a military stronghold from the Joseon dynasty.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Time & Blade Museum (ÌÉÄÏûÑÏï§Î∏îÎ†àÏù¥Îìú Î∞ïÎ¨ºÍ¥Ä)
dataList.description: The Time & Blade Museum features two floors filled with items that have shaped the development of humankind. There are many clocks and watches on display, with the largest hall dedicated to skeleton clocks. The museum also displays the parts that make up a clock and the tools used to create them.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: The Garden of Morning Calm (ÏïÑÏπ®Í≥†ÏöîÏàòÎ™©Ïõê)
dataList.description: The Garden of Morning Calm showcases the beauty of Korean horticulture before the backdrop of Chungryeongsan Mountain. Visitors can walk among a profusion of flowers in unique gardens and through a lush forest of pine nut trees. The garden was opened in May 1996 by horticultural professor Han Sang-kyung, and features 20 different themed sections, connected by scenic walkways. The Sunken Garden is shaped like the Korean Peninsula and is carpeted with beautiful flowers on both sides representing the desire for South and North Korea to be reunited. It is easily one of the garden's most popular and meaningful attractions. The garden houses about 5,000 kinds of plants, including 300 varieties native to Baekdusan Mountain, known as a spiritual mountain to the Korean people. The garden has served as a filming site for many productions.
dataList.author: korea-tour
